description:
These top of the line Shimano Dura-Ace shift cables and housing are built with the quality and care you'd expect from a Dura-Ace component.

  • Combination of polymer-coated cables and pre-lubricated casing improves cable glide
  • Sealed end caps provide mud protection
  • 1 polymer coated stainless steel inner cable ø 1.2mm x 2100mm
  • 1 polymer coated stainless steel inner cable ø 1.2mm x 1800mm
  • 2 outer caps with short tongue for ST-9000
  • 3 outer caps with long tongue
  • 1 sealed outer cap for rear deraileur
  • 2 inner end caps
  • 1 OT-SP41 outer casing 1700mm
name: Shimano OT-SP41 Dura Ace Polymer Shift Cable Set
